availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William H. Mathews (Henry County and Owen County, Kentucky, physician and soldier.)

body.p: Henry County and Owen County, Kentucky, physician and soldier. Henry County, Kentucky, native. Son of Caleb Mathews and Frances Mathews. Resident of Henry County, Kentucky in 1850. Physician in Owen County in 1860. Served in the 7th Kentucky Battalion Mounted Infantry (C.S.A.) as a surgeon from June 1864.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, District 1 p. 370A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States(1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Owen County, District 2, p. 214.
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky: Confederate Kentucky Volunteers War 1861-65, vol. II (Frankfort: Legislature of Kentucky, 1915), p. 332.
"William H Mathews (1839-1872)," Find A Grave, Memorial 87756746, Accessed July 21, 2022, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/87756746.
